Package com.flag4j.linalg.solvers

Class MatrixLUSolver

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.linalg.solvers.LUSolver<Matrix,​Vector,​Vector>
com.flag4j.linalg.solvers.MatrixLUSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
LinearSolver<Matrix,​Vector,​Vector>
public class MatrixLUSolver extends LUSolver<Matrix,​Vector,​Vector>
Solver for solving a well determined system of linear equations in an exact sense using the LU decomposition.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      public Vector solve​(Matrix A, Vector b)
      Solves the linear system of equations given by A*x=b for x.
      Parameters:
      A - Coefficient matrix in the linear system. Must be square and have full rank (i.e. all rows, or equivalently columns, must be linearly independent).
      b - Vector of constants in the linear system.
      Returns:
      The solution to x in the linear system A*x=b.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the number of columns in A is not equal to the number of entries in b.
      IllegalArgumentException - If A is not square.
      IllegalArgumentException - If A is not full rank.
